name: SXZ Pencil Project [ Style ]
description:
All the content I make is and will be completely free on CivitAI.
But if you want to support me with a coin, then you can do it here.

Trained on AbyssOrangeMix2 with clip skip 2.

Recommended embeddings:
1. easynegative
2. bad-hands-5

Strength 1 - 0.6 is optimal.

PLEASE CHECK YOUR LORA NAME AFTER DOWNLOAD.

There is no trigger word. But if you want a pencil sketch you need to add pencil sketch in your prompt.

Also if you want a concept art sheet then you need to add all or some of this tags: pencil sketch, concept art, character design, reference sheet

And also you may add color spots in your images, by adding color in your prompt like red hair, blue eyes, purple dress etc.

For stylization only you may go with your common prompt, but i recommend to use this tags in the end of your prompt:
volumetric lighting, best quality, masterpiece, intricate details, realistic

This lora is resolution and hires.fix friendly, so feel free to experiment and share your feedback. Enjoy!
